casebody.data:
2001-3344 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Malcolm HILL. No. 2001-KP-3344. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Hill, Malcolm; — Defendant; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court Div. G, No. 387-535; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2001-K-2016.

Denied.
